abstracts.cdata!:
The Vocational Training Project
            comprises: (a) construction, furnishing and equipping of two
            vocational training centers, including: (i) one new center
            at Guayaquil with a capacity of 1,245 student places to
            provide opportunities for about 2,895 trainees annually;
            (ii) extension of the vocational training center at Quito to
            increase its capacity from 390 to 1,110 student places and
            thereby provide opportunities for about 2,745 trainees
            annually; and (b) provision of two mobile units to provide
            training opportunities for about 500 trainees annually in
            rural communities and small townships.
